item.title: How to Turn Your TV Into a Smart TV
item.description:
There are a multitude of options and products to help turn your standard television into a “smart” television without digging deep into your savings.

With streaming services such as: Netflix, hulu and HBO becoming more and more popular, the need for a smart TV is rising … and quickly. Although companies like Samsung and Vizio make great products, they come at a high pricepoint. Trust me, there are other options.
